item.title: 【Interviews / TV shows / Others】WEB-RiP - NHK World-Japan Music Festival 2023 - 11/19-26/23 - 720 NHK World-Japan
item.description:
It's time for the moment you've been waiting for! The NHK-World Japan Music Festival! Both of the 2 parts will be shown here, and the 2nd one is jam packed with ANIME OPs and EDs!
Broadcasts Times: November 19 & 26, 2023
Source: NHK-World Japan (On-Demand)
OPs mean Opening Themes, while EDs mean Ending Themes.
Part 1 - November 19, 2023
(Text in BOLD are meant to show covers)
FIRST ACT - 1. BE:FIRST - Mainstream
2. Ryokuoushoku Shakai (緑黄色社会) - Be A Flower (花になって) (The Apothecary Diaries OP, Full Ver.)
3. BAND-MAID - Shambles (Kengan Ahsurad ED 2, Full Ver.)
4. Mrs. GREEN APPLE - I'm Invincible (Ado Cover) (ONCE PIECE FILM RED Songs by the character Uta)
[Q&A Part]
5. AiNA THE END - Red:birthmark (Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch From Mercury ED 2, Full Ver.)
6. CHAMELEON LIME WHOOPIEPIE - LaLaLa
7. Yuka - Baby you
8. imase - NIGHT DANCER
9. Sakurazaka46 - Shoninyokkyu
General

Part 2 - November 26, 2023
1. Queen Bee - Mephisto (OSHI NO KO ED, Full Ver.) (And no, YOASOBI is not here)
2. Takahasi Yoko - The Cruel Angel's Thesis (NEON GENISIS EVANGELION OP, Full Ver.)
3. Suzuki Masayuki - DADDY ! DADDY ! DO ! (Kaguaya-Sama: Love Is War? OP, Full Ver.)
4. Suzuki Masayuki & Takagi Reni - Love is Show (Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: First Kiss OP, Full Ver.)
5. Kajiura Yuki - Demon Slayer Main Theme
6. Kajiura Yuki - Magia (Madoka Magica ED, Full Ver,)
7. Kajiura Yuki - SOUKYUU NO FANFARE (Sword Art Online 10th Aniversary Theme Song)
[Q&A Part]
8. ASCA - RESISTER (Sword Art Online Alicization OP, Full Ver.)
9. ReoNa - R.I.P (Arknights: PERISH IN FROST ED, Full Ver.)
10. KESSOKU BAND (From Bocchi The Rock, Performed by the Voice Actor of Kita Ikuyo (Hasegawa Ikumi)) - Seisyun Complex (Bocchi The Rock OP, Full Ver.) (Performing First on TV)
FINAL ACT - 11. KANJANI∞ - LIFE
